page.title: 13Lack Of Sporting Facilities
page.content: There are no sporting facilities in Pendock only at the School. You cannot play games on Saturdays. I think there should be a football club and other clubs. We have to go a long way to play games. We have to go to Redmarley to play tennis and we have to go to Gloucester for other sports. In Gloucester there are lots of sports.There is cricket, snooker, pool and squash and many other facilities. There are not enough people in Pendock who like games and there is not enough money available in the area to pay for a sports' stadium, for those of us who would like one.
